In a message dated 2/4/03 5:58:56 AM Central Standard Time, 
cardhead649@... writes:


> Well, imagine the automatic slaughter that would ensue when someone 
> brings a character the relative size of Omega Supreme, or worse, 
> Trypticon into a battle, and you'll see why it makes sense.

I don't second guess.... I gather the facts on issues. I can see why not 
bringing Omega Supreme in to this type rpg, since this is not set in the 
present times but further in the future. 
But, I try to respect technicalities. Plus, it's the Leaders to make sure 
that they have the decent control over their troops. & the right troops, the 
supplies for them & so on & so forth. Common military sense.  
But I will also respect the wishes of the mods in this rpg.



--part1_55.3802d6ce.2b718491_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
